attributes.action: get our troops ot of Iraq and Afganistan by Christmas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are clearly not achieving anything in these two countries. The war was started on a lie.
We are putting our soldiers in unnecessary danger. They are ill equipped and demoralished acting as a buffer between the different factions living in these countries

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
